attributes.action: ensure the United Nations provide a fleet of basic helicopters for use in natural disaster relief operations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Nations should provide 4 ships, each strategically placed around the world, containing 50 basic helicopters for use in disaster relief operations (similar in nature to the Falklands ship Atlantic Conveyor). The helicopters should be of a basic type  that could be flown by local ex military or civilian pilots. The ships should be equipped to allow deployment, maintenance, resupply & refueling of the helicopters to be carried out without the need for land based facilities. The nearest ship to be deployed to the disaster area at the time of need and a dedicated maintenance team to be flown out to the ship to ensure safe helicopter operations.Pilots to be provide if required.
